programme.desc: A successful asset manager's life is placed in jeopardy when a temp worker starts stalking him(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: In the distant future, graduate Jonny joins the military to impress his childhood sweetheart. What he doesn't expect is an army of mega alien bugs to descend on Earth. It's a gory battle to the death in this sci-fi actioner(n)

programme.title: The Anniversary Party
programme.desc: Jennifer Jason Leigh and Alan Cumming co-wrote, co-directed and costar in this well-acted, all-star comedy-drama about a show-business couple's sixth-anniversary bash---a daylong affair of sex, drugs, professional rivalries and personal grudges. Kevin Kline, Phoebe Cates, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jane Adams, John C. Reilly, John Benjamin Hickey, Parker Posey(n)

programme.title: 24 Hour Party People
programme.desc: Tracing the vibrant post-punk Manchester musical movement through the eyes of real-life TV personality and record magnate Tony Wilson(n)

programme.title: Down the Shore
programme.desc: The proud owner of an aging Jersey Shore amusement park (James Gandolfini) finds his life thrown into disarray when a French stranger appears on his doorstep claiming to be his late sister's widowed husband, staking his claim on half of his house and dragging long-buried family secrets to the surface as he searches for work. Famke Janssen and Edoardo Costa co-star(n)

programme.title: Woman on Top
programme.desc: Penelope Cruz stars in this spicy romantic-comedy as a Brazilian bombshell chef who melts the hearts of men everywhere. But when she catches her husband cheating, she moves to San Francisco and discovers happiness as the star of her own TV cooking show. Murilo Benicio, Harold Perrineau Jr(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: Experienced rafter Gail is introducing her family to the river she grew up on, when two dangerous strangers throw their vacation into jeopardy. Tense drama(n)

programme.title: Wolf Totem
programme.desc: In this exciting adventure set in 1960s China, a student from Beijing is sent to teach a nomadic tribe in Mongolia. While there, he cares for and adopts a wolf cub, and their bond causes him to see the world in a new light(n)

programme.title: Traitor
programme.desc: An FBI agent suspects a Muslim ex-US Special Operations officer of being involved with terrorists in this complex espionage thriller(n)

programme.title: The Children of Huang Shi
programme.desc: About young British journalist, George Hogg, who with the assistance of a courageous Australian nurse, saves a group of orphaned children during the Japanese occupation of China(n)

programme.title: The Anniversary Party
programme.desc: Jennifer Jason Leigh and Alan Cumming co-wrote, co-directed and costar in this well-acted, all-star comedy-drama about a show-business couple's sixth-anniversary bash---a daylong affair of sex, drugs, professional rivalries and personal grudges. Kevin Kline, Phoebe Cates, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jane Adams, John C. Reilly, John Benjamin Hickey, Parker Posey(n)

programme.title: Hysteria
programme.desc: In Victorian London, a young doctor named Mortimer goes to work for an older physician who specialises in treating "hysteria" in women, a condition he cures by manually manipulating them to achieve orgasm(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Tip-offs to would-be journalist Sondra Pransky from beyond the grave improbably identify a serial killer stalking London as dashing aristocrat Peter Lyman. Aided by cynical magician Sid, Sondra strikes up a relationship with the suspect(n)

programme.title: Barton Fink
programme.desc: Offbeat Coen Brothers tale of a playwright who comes to Los Angeles to write heavyweight moral dramas. Instead, he gets lumbered with a wrestling picture. Featuring a punchy performance by Coen favourite John Goodman(n)

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed 'Generation X' comedy about a day in the life of a pair of shop workers. Shot in black-and-white, the movie stars Brian O'Halloran as Dante, the young assistant in a convenience store, and Jeff Anderson as Randal, an employee in the video rental shop next door(n)
Fact-based account of a group of gifted university students who develop a system for card-counting and use it to win big at Las Vegas casinos(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Johnny Depp stars as a writer on assignment who goes on a drug-fueled binge in Las Vegas with his lawyer, Dr Gonzo. Adapted from Hunter S. Thompson's 1971 novel(n)

programme.title: Traitor
programme.desc: An FBI agent suspects a Muslim ex-US Special Operations officer of being involved with terrorists in this complex espionage thriller(n)

programme.title: Brick
programme.desc: A student investigates a mysterious death in this noirish crime thriller(n)

programme.title: L'Auberge Espagnole
programme.desc: In this refreshing and lively comedy, a French student moves to Barcelona to study Spanish to improve his career opportunities. He moves in with six other European roommates and gets some lessons in life and love(n)

programme.title: What Dreams May Come
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars in this sentimental, metaphysical love story about a husband's efforts to reunite with his wife in the afterlife(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Johnny Depp stars as a writer on assignment who goes on a drug-fueled binge in Las Vegas with his lawyer, Dr Gonzo. Adapted from Hunter S. Thompson's 1971 novel(n)

programme.title: The Weight of Water
programme.desc: A photographer travels to New Hampshire to investigate the double murder of two women in 1873. Discovering an eye witness account she starts to see parallels between herself and a survivor(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: . In the waning days of World War II, General Douglas MacArthur chose to make good on a pledge that he made in 1942 -- that he would return to the Philippines after he and his troops were forced to retreat. However, MacArthur's determination was more than a matter of pride. Over 500 American soldiers were being held in Cabanatuan, a notoriously brutal prisoner of war camp in the Philippines operated by the Japanese army, and MacArthur wanted to see to it that they made it home(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: In 'Brooklyn's Finest', we're taken on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie (Richard Gere) is a bitter and disillusioned veteran cop who's a week away from retirement. Tango (Don Cheadle) is an undercover narcotics cop who tries desperately to leave the streets and earn a promotion to a desk job. Much like Eddie, he's lost sight of his priorities and his loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. At the same time, narcotics detective Sal is a family man in despair and needs to raise money to buy a better house for his family. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene(n)

programme.title: Brick
programme.desc: A student investigates a mysterious death in this noirish crime thriller(n)

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Reeling from personal and professional disappointments, a musician moves into the Hamptons home of her father, a Sinatra-esque crooner still hoping to make a career comeback. In time, father and daughter bond while seeking success in the music industry(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: Plucked from the ranks of the US Army because he is the most unremarkable, average individual they have, Corporal Joe Bauers participates in a top-secret human hibernation experiment that is intended to put him to sleep for a year. He is joined by prostitute Rita, who believes that she will escape from pending criminal charges if she takes part. After a series of mishaps, including the arrest and incarceration of the officer in charge of the project, the unlucky pair are abandoned and forgotten, only to wake up 500 years later in a world where the rampant breeding of stupid people has created a universally dumb society ruled by half-wits. Thus Joe and Rita find themselves in a brave new world where they are the two most towering intellects on the planet in Mike Judge's sci-fi comedy(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to Los Angeles to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mother's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: The best of the 'baby' movies of the late '80s, with Diane Keaton as New York advertising executive JC Wiatt, a career-minded yuppie who's far too busy to be bothered with raising a child - until she inherits a twelve-month-old girl named Elizabeth from her cousin! JC's regimented life is turned completely upside down, as she finds herself surrounded by nappies, baby food and an increasingly distant husband (Harold R(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger shows his lighter side in this jolly Yuletide comedy. He plays an overworked father who scrambles to find the perfect gift for his son on Christmas Eve. Desperate to make up for previous disappointments, he searches the city and battles frantic parents, a toy-crazed postal worker and a deviant Santa to find the elusive Turbo Man doll. Sinbad, Phil Hartman, Rita Wilson(n)

programme.title: Sydney White
programme.desc: After pledging her late mother's once-dignified sorority, a college freshman aligns herself with seven social outcasts in an attempt to influence change over the school's flawed social hierarchy in this comedy starring Amanda Bynes. College freshman Sydney White (Bynes) has just arrived at Southern Atlantic University ready and eager to pledge her late mother's sorority. Once upon a time, this sorority was dignified and respected, but that pristine reputation has been tarnished now that blonde tyrant Rachel (Sara Paxton) has taken over as student council president. After surviving the sorority's vigorous pledging process, Syd is quickly banished for daring to question Rachel's regime. Now left with nowhere to go but a condemned house on the edge of Greek Row, the dejected and rejected pledge quickly makes friends with seven of the biggest social outcasts on campus. But while these socially challenged frat boys may not be much to look at, it gradually becomes apparent to Syd that they all have their fair share of admirable qualities -- especially love-struck super-geek Tyler (Matt Long). Perhaps if these nerdy frat boys and their new queen could successfully shake up the system by staging a successful takeover of the student government, they could restore the once-proud reputation of this prestigious university and offer a glimmer of hope to campus geeks everywhere!(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Lovelorn Ben Stiller hires sleazy investigator Matt Dillon to track down childhood sweetheart Cameron Diaz. Gross-out gag fest of hair gel, horny hounds and humiliation(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to Los Angeles to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mother's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: Plucked from the ranks of the US Army because he is the most unremarkable, average individual they have, Corporal Joe Bauers participates in a top-secret human hibernation experiment that is intended to put him to sleep for a year. He is joined by prostitute Rita, who believes that she will escape from pending criminal charges if she takes part. Thus Joe and Rita find themselves in a brave new world where they are the two most towering intellects on the planet in Mike Judge's sci-fi comedy(n)

programme.title: Summer School
programme.desc: High school teacher Mark Harmon finds himself forced to teach English to a class of teenagers each with their own problem or hang-up. Crazy humour and some affecting drama ensues, although the best gags are reserved for Chainsaw and Dave, two horror film-loving teens obsessed with The Texas Chainsaw Massacre(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Summer Rental
programme.desc: After air traffic controller Jack Chester loses a plane (it's covered on his screen by a fly), he's told to take a break. Jack books his family into a plush resort, but it turns out that their lodgings are in a hut by the beach. And that's as good as the vacation gets... 80s comedy(n)

programme.title: Easy Money
programme.desc: Comedy with the great Rodney Dangerfield in line to get a $10 million inheritance ... if he can give up smoking, drinking and gambling for a whole year!(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to Los Angeles to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mother's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: The FilmFour funded Trainspotting is acknowledged to be one of the most original films to come out of Britain in the last decade. The multi-award-winning film based on Irvine Welsh's novel, stars Ewan McGregor, Ewen Bremner, Jonny Lee Miller, Robert Carlyle, Kelly Macdonald and Kevin McKidd in a story of drugs, survival, scams, friendship and tragedy(n)

programme.title: Chasing Amy
programme.desc: The concluding chapter of Kevin Smith's "New Jersey" trilogy, Chasing Amy stars Ben Affleck as Holden, a successful comic-book creator who falls madly for Alyssa, a fellow artist played by Joe Lauren Adams. The first major shock awaiting Holden is Alyssa's apparent lesbianism. The second is that she's really bisexual, and the two begin an affair, despite his nagging doubts about her promiscuous past. Smith's most ambitious film to date, much of Chasing Amy forgoes the outrageous shock humor of his previous work in favor of a mature examination of sexual identity and emotional risk. His reach often exceeds his grasp, but nevertheless, the film is a major turning point in the continued evolution of one of the American independent scene's most vital and original voices(n)

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: Hugh Grant plays child psychiatrist Samuel Faulkner who, ironically, can't stand children. So when his girlfriend Rebecca tells him she's pregnant, he's less than thrilled and eventually, fed up with his moaning, she moves out to stay with her friends Marty and Gail. This being a Chris Columbus film, it all ends happily but not without complications along the way, in particular from Robin Williams as a Russian obstetrician who is prone to malapropisms and hasn't actually delivered a baby before(n)

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: Hollywood heart-throbs Michelle Pfeiffer and George Clooney fall for one another in this old-fashioned romantic New York comedy about a pair of mismatched professionals. Melanie Parker (Pfeiffer) is a single parent and professional architect who somehow manages to combine the skills of her high-flying career with those of a supermum to her young son. Jack Taylor (Clooney), meanwhile, is a newspaper columnist who takes custody of his daughter every other weekend. On this particular fine day, Melanie, Jack and their children are going to be thrown together by circumstance for one chaotic day in which they will lose each other, miss meetings, jeopardise their careers - and find true love!(n)

programme.title: Blue Jasmine
programme.desc: Woody Allen trades New York City for San Francisco with his comedy-drama Blue Jasmine, starring Cate Blanchett as a troubled former Manhattanite who moves to the City by the Bay to live with her sister after her wealthy husband divorces her. Forced to put her life back together piece by piece while under the effect of powerful anti-depressants, she dates a series of men, attempts to build a career, and slowly learns how to count on herself to survive. Alec Baldwin, Louis C.K., and Bobby Cannavale co-star(n)

programme.title: Summer School
programme.desc: High school teacher Mark Harmon finds himself forced to teach English to a class of teenagers each with their own problem or hang-up. Crazy humour and some affecting drama ensues, although the best gags are reserved for Chainsaw and Dave, two horror film-loving teens obsessed with The Texas Chainsaw Massacre(n)

programme.title: Hanging Up
programme.desc: Touching comedy drama about three sisters going through a difficult time. One is a successful magazine editor, another an insecure soap actress, and the third a ditzy party organiser-cum-housewife. The girls' father, egotistical and capricious at the best of times, is now dying, and the trio try to make their peace with him and with each other in a series of telephone conversations(n)

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Bill Murray has joined the Army, and the Army will never be the same! When John Winger loses his job, his car, his apartment and his grilfriend -all in one day - he decides he has only one option: volunteer for the army. And he talks his friend Russell into enlising with him. Where else, they figure, can they help save the world for democracy....and meet girls! John and Russell find basic training a snap: they are arrested twice, have endless run-ins with their drill sergeant and get into a big mess at a female mud wrestling match. They even steal a top secret government vehicle to take some gorgeous female Mps on a date, and wind up behind the iron curtain. Stripes is outrageous fun!(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Deliver Us From Eva
programme.desc: Three men discover that meddling in their sister-in-law's love life only makes their own lives more complicated in this romantic comedy. Eva Dandridge (Gabrielle Union) developed a sense of responsibility early on in life, when after the death of her parents she was left to care for her three younger sisters, Kareenah (Essence Atkins), Bethany (Robinne Lee), and Jacqui (Meagan Good). All four of the Dandridge sisters have grown up to be attractive, intelligent, and successful; Kareenah is happily married to Tim (Mel Jackson), while Bethany is engaged to Michael (Duane Martin), and Jacqui is going steady with Darrell (Dartanyan Edmonds). However, Eva still watches over her siblings like a hawk, and while her sisters love Eva dearly, Tim, Michael, and Darrell wish their sister-in-law would stay out of their business. The guys decide that if Eva had a boyfriend, she might be less interested in running other people's lives, and they turn to Ray (LL Cool J), a notorious ladies' man, for help. Ray is short on cash, so the guys make him a deal -- they'll give him 5,000 dollars to romance Eva, sweep her off her feet, and then dump her a few weeks later. Ray agrees, and while getting past her no-nonsense demeanor takes some doing, before long she's head over heels for him. However, Ray unexpectedly finds himself falling in love with Eva, and Eva, when offered a job in another town, decides to stay on to be with Ray. Even worse, the other Dandridge sisters are so impressed with the romantic Ray that they start demanding a bit more TLC from their own men(n)

programme.title: Blue Jasmine

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: A suicidal teenager finds help and love in group-therapy sessions with other patients his own age(n)

programme.title: State Property
programme.desc: A killer hip-hop soundtrack backbeats this intense urban drama about gangsters who muscle in on the drug trade in their Philly neighborhood. Things get complicated when they buck up against local crime lords(n)

programme.title: Nat King Cole: Afraid of the Dark
programme.desc: A profile of singer Nat King Cole examines his time as the only black TV star on the air(n)

programme.title: Half of a Yellow Sun
programme.desc: Based on Nigerian author Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's novel, set during the Nigerian-Biafran War(n)

programme.title: The Scout
programme.desc: Al Percolo is the scout who'd do anything to sign a prospect. Unfortunately, things weren't going his way, and Al found his career heading south - all the way to Mexico - unitl he discovered Steve Nebraska, the greatest ball player who ever lived. Now, Al thinks he's back on top, and Steve believes he's found a new friend. And they're both about to discover how much they need each other(n)

programme.title: Tales From the Hood
programme.desc: When a trio of young criminals break into a funeral home searching for a stash of drugs, they instead find themselves face to face with a creepy mortician, who tells them four separate stories of terror. This anthology film attempts a black-oriented, socially conscious spin on the horror genre(n)

programme.title: Red Hook Summer
programme.desc: In this affectionate slice of life, a boy from Atlanta spends a summer in Brooklyn under the watchful eye of his grandfather, a bishop at a local church, and he connects with a pretty girl who expands his understanding of the world(n)

programme.title: Idle Hands
programme.desc: The Devil finds work for idle hands, but makes a big mistake when he chooses the world's laziest slacker to do his dirty work in this gruesome horror comedy. Devon Sawa stars as a teen who tries to control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand before it takes total control of his life. Seth Green, Elden Henson, Jessica Alba, Steve Van Wormer, Fred Willard, Jack Noseworthy(n)

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: Quiet diplomat Justin searches for answers when his activist wife is murdered in Kenya(n)

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: After World War 3, emotions are outlawed. Enforcers called 'clerics' hunt down offenders and execute them. When his wife and his partner die, 'cleric' Preston joins the resistance and attacks the system which employed him(n)

programme.title: Half of a Yellow Sun
programme.desc: Based on Nigerian author Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's novel, set during the Nigerian-Biafran War(n)

programme.title: Red Hook Summer
programme.desc: In this affectionate slice of life, a boy from Atlanta spends a summer in Brooklyn under the watchful eye of his grandfather, a bishop at a local church, and he connects with a pretty girl who expands his understanding of the world(n)

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: An ocean-themed Florida amusement park comes under attack from an angry Great White shark in this third installment of the horror series. The film maintains only a loose relationship to the original Steven Spielberg hit, centering on Mike (Dennis Quaid) and Sean (John Putch), the sons of police chief Martin Brody (originally played by Roy Scheider). Mike works at Sea World, where a baby Great White shark has accidentially been let into the park. Soon, the baby's vicious and extremely powerful mother comes in search of her child. The film focuses most of its attention on the series of tense shark attacks that follow, as tourists run for their lives while the park workers struggle to destroy the sharp-toothed beast. The suspense sequences were made somewhat more memorable during the film's original release with 3-D photography, an attribute lost on video, thereby removing the most distinctive element of an otherwise run-of-the-mill sequel(n)

programme.title: Jaws: The Revenge
programme.desc: Just when Mrs. Brody thought it was safe, a great white shark follows her to the Bahamas after killing her son(n)

programme.title: Tales From the Hood
programme.desc: When a trio of young criminals break into a funeral home searching for a stash of drugs, they instead find themselves face to face with a creepy mortician, who tells them four separate stories of terror. This anthology film attempts a black-oriented, socially conscious spin on the horror genre(n)

programme.title: Backstage
programme.desc: Uncut and uncensored documentary of a rap concert, with onstage performances from Ja Rule, DMX, Jay-Z, Redman, Method Man and Memphis Black, plus an intimate view of life on the road(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Hitman
programme.desc: Tense thriller based on a play starring Forest Whitaker, Sherilyn Fenn, James Belushi, Sharon Stone. the longer a hitman waits, the harder the hit becomes(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: Political intrigue and deception unfold inside the United Nations, where a U.S. Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate an interpreter who overhears an assassination plot(n)

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda
programme.desc: Director: Terry George. The true-life story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda(n)

programme.title: Best Laid Plans
programme.desc: In this clever and involving thriller, two friends (Alessandro Nivola, Josh Brolin) become involved in a nightmarish puzzle after one of them picks up a woman (Reese Witherspoon), who then accuses him of rape. Rocky Carroll, Michael G. Hagerty, Terrence Dashon Howard(n)

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Angela Bassett stars in this sexy, sassy romantic comedy about a 40-year-old mother who realises her life may be heading in the wrong direction. Stella Payne is a workaholic San Franciscan executive who spends what little spare time she has with her family. But then it occurs to her that she's missing out on something big - romance. Having encountered Winston Shakespeare (Taye Diggs), a Jamaican man 20 years her junior, Stella decides the time has come to get back on the dating circuit. but just how will she go about getting back her groove?(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: Political intrigue and deception unfold inside the United Nations, where a U.S. Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate an interpreter who overhears an assassination plot(n)

programme.title: In My Country
programme.desc: Bravura performances drive this powerful fact-based drama set in South Africa. Juliette Binoche stars as an Afrikaans reporter and Samuel L. Jackson is a U.S. journalist who begin an affair while covering an investigation into human-rights abuses. John Boorman directed. Brendan Gleeson, Menzi 'Ngubs' Ngubane, Sam Ngakane, Aletta Bezuidenhout, Lionel Newton, Langley Kirkwood, Owen Sejake(n)

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Skydiving ace Ty Moncrief lands on federal buildings and steals files containing the names of undercover agents which he sells to drug barons. Pete Nessip is the marshal who takes to the air to bring him down(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: An ambitious teenager discovers a pin that transports her to a futuristic world. She then teams up with a jaded genius, and they embark on an adventure through time and space to save the Earth(n)

programme.title: Honey
programme.desc: A dancer tries to balance her dreams of stardom with her devotion to her old neighborhood. Rappers Missy Elliott, Ginuwine and Jadakiss have cameos(n)

programme.title: Enchanted Kingdom
programme.desc: The many wondrous sights and sounds of Africa are explored in this far-reaching nature documentary(n)

programme.title: Mrs. Santa Claus
programme.desc: Not feeling adequately recognized for her contributions to the smooth operations at the North Pole, a disgruntled Mrs. Santa Claus moves to New York City at the turn of the century. programme.title: Tuck Everlasting
programme.desc: Natalie Babbitt's award winning book for children comes to the screen in a lavish adaptation from Walt Disney Pictures. Winnie Foster (Alexis Bledel) is a girl in her early teens growing up in the small rural town of Winesap in 1914. Winnie's parents (Victor Garber and Amy Irving) are loving but overprotective, and Winnie longs for a life of greater freedom and adventure. One day, while exploring the nearby woods, Winnie gets lost, but she has the good fortune to happen upon the Tuck Family, who live nearby - mother Mae (Sissy Spacek), father Angus (William Hurt), and sons Jesse (Jonathan Jackson) and Miles (Scott Bairstow). The Tucks are warm and caring people, and Winnie feels right at home with them; she also finds herself developing a serious crush on Jesse, and isn't so sure she wants to return; meanwhile, her parents become increasingly distraught as they search for their missing daughter. But in time Winnie discovers there's a secret behind the seemingly idyllic lives of the Tuck Family; they have discovered a magical spring on their property, and anyone who drinks from it will never grow old and never die. While to Winnie this sounds like a wonderful prospect, the Tucks have come to understand this is as much of a curse as a blessing, especially when she realizes Jesse is considerably older than she is. The Tucks also have to contend with the presence of the sinister Man In The Yellow Suit (Ben Kingsley), who wishes to buy their property and make a fortune from their "fountain of youth." Tuck Everlasting was directed by Jay Russell, who previously directed the acclaimed family film My Dog Skip(n)

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: "In telling the story of my father, it's hard to separate fact from fiction. But that's the kind of story it is." So says William Bloom during the opening stages of Tim Burton's Big Fish. Bloom's father is Edward Bloom,an old codger who may be largely benign but is deemed a bullshitter by his son, and a selfish one at that. Edward's endless recounting of yarns about himself has distanced father and son. But when Edward is diagnosed with terminal cancer, William returns to the family home to try and make his peace, and find out who his father really is. Bed-bound, and with an audience of not just the cynical William but also his receptive wife Josephine, Edward recounts his remarkable life in fragments(n)

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Betrayal. This is the legendary "backwards" episode, beginning at the end with a bedraggled Jerry (Jerry Seinfeld), George (Jason Alexander), and Elaine (Julia Louis-Dreyfus) returning from a trip to India. Thereafter, each successive scene takes us back in time, culminating with the opening of the story -- 13 years earlier! In between, the action involves a birthday, a wedding, a snowball, and a man with the initials F.D.R. For the benefit of those confused by the reverse chronology, the syndicated print of this episode superimposes "time cards" at crucial points in the story(n)

The result is the stirring documentary "SHEOS" (well, heck, no one should expect an "auteur" to know how to spell). The film proves so impressive that the National Endowment of the Arts offers Kelly $10,000 to make a sequel, whereupon Al proposes his own personal epic, replete with bikini girls. This episode was originally shown in tandem with My Favorite Married, a half-hour special in which the cast of Married. . .With Children introduced clips from their favorite episodes(n)

He gets his chance in a roundabout fashion when campus-radio deejays Oliver Cole (Eric Dane) and Mark Campbell (Andrew Kovavit) are kicked off station W-HIP for revealing a few inconvenient truths about dean Steve Rhodes (David Garrison), in his final series appearance). programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with Two Parts. This episode marks the first appearance of Phoebe's (Lisa Kudrow) twin sister, Ursula (also played by Kudrow), who is the exact opposite of the considerate and peace-loving Phoebe. Joey starts to date Ursula, which annoys Phoebe because she doesn't get along with her sister. Meanwhile, Ross (David Schwimmer) attends Lamaze class with Susan (Jessica Hecht) and Carol (Jane Sibbett). As Carol voices her anxiety about going through with the pregnancy, Ross also begins to come to terms with his role as a father; much humor is made over who gets to play the father role in the class exercises. Across town, Chandler (Matthew Perry) is dating Nina (Jennifer Grant), an employee he cannot bring himself to fire -- instead, he tells the other office workers that she is insane and too imbalanced to let go. When Nina asks why her co-workers are avoiding her, Chandler says that perhaps they are jealous of their relationship. After Marcel, Ross' monkey, changes Monica's (Courteney Cox) TV to Spanish mode, the gang sits around and watches it. This leads Joey to make the astute observation that "Urkel" is spelled the same way in Spanish as it is in English. Helen Hunt and Leila Kenzle show up at Central Perk as Jamie and Fran, their characters from Mad About You. This episode is part one of a two-part episode that originally aired on February 23, 1995(n)

Alas, this cozy tête-à-tête is ruined by the untimely arrival of Rachel's ex-fiancé, the former Mr. Potato Head (aka Barry Farber [Mitchell Whitfield]). programme.desc: The story of Charles Stewart Parnell and Katherine O'Shea, whose 10-year affair led to a major political split and public backlash. Parnell, leader of the Irish Party, fathered three children with the wife of Captain William O'Shea, earning her the nickname Kitty - Victorian English slang for prostitute. programme.desc: Fame. The show follows a crime, ususally adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points. The first half of the show concentrates on the investigation of the crime by the police, the second half follows the prosecution of the crime in court(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Avatar. When an internet posting of a slashed soccer mum dressed provocatively triggers a slew of 911 calls, Green and Cassady investigate. Arriving at the scene of the grisly crime, the duo discover something isn't quite right - the clothes and shoes don't fit the victim. When clues lead to a suspect suffering from schizophrenia, the case appears to have been closed(n)

programme.title: The Last Ship
programme.desc: Achilles. Chandler and his crew duel against rogue British naval officers manning a nuclear-powered submarine. Meanwhile, Slattery interrogates a mercenary to learn more about a hospital ship, and a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse ensues(n)

programme.title: The Last Ship
programme.desc: Long Day's Journey. Chandler tracks the Immunes to Northern Florida in a bid to avenge the destruction of the labs. Elsewhere, Rachel unearths a secret yet incomplete cure formula, and Chandler's team locates an Immune compound controlled by Sean and Ned(n)

programme.title: The Last Ship
programme.desc: Alone and Unafraid. Chandler and his team infiltrate an Immune compound. Danny poses as one of Ned's workers and discovers that Patient Zero is working for the Ramseys. Meanwhile, Chandler inches into Sean's inner circle(n)

programme.title: The Last Ship
programme.desc: Safe Zone. Chandler tries to gain intel and reverse the brainwashing suffered by Michener. Also: Rachel attempts to construct Dr Hunter's lost formula while wrestling with the knowledge that her bitter enemy is now on board the Nathan James(n)

programme.desc: Profiteer. The show follows a crime, ususally adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points. The first half of the show concentrates on the investigation of the crime by the police, the second half follows the prosecution of the crime in court(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: Dodger. Oliver asks detective McKenna on a date; a jewel thief named Dodger hits Starling City and targets someone close to Oliver; a pickpocket named Roy Harper steals Thea's purse; Moira makes a move against Malcolm(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Baby's First Demon. A demon tries to steal Piper's baby so he can sell the boy to other demons, but the infant possesses a magical force field that helps protect him from evil. Meanwhile, Phoebe is attracted to her newspaper's new rich publisher(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Lucky Charmed. The sisters face off against a reptile demon that plans to take over the underworld by hunting leprechauns and stealing their power to generate luck. Elsewhere, Phoebe endures Internet dating after she is assigned to write an article for her newspaper(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Cat House. Piper casts an errant spell that sends Phoebe and Paige back in time and forces them to observe moments that Leo and Piper are sharing with a marriage counselor. Meanwhile, a warlock is also swept up in the temporal anomaly as he hunts an elusive witch(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.sub-title: It's the Great Pumpkin, Sam Winchester
programme.desc: It's the Great Pumpkin, Sam Winchester. The brothers are warned off investigating some mysterious deaths in a small town by Castiel and his fellow angel Uriel. But Sam and Dean go anyway, and discover that a witch is sacrificing people in order to summon the terrifying demon Samhain(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Wishful Thinking. When Sam and Dean investigate a small town where a wishing well actually works, they soon realise that it could have disastrous results(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.sub-title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: I Know What You Did Last Summer. Prophet Anna Milton can hear the voices of angels, and a demon called Alastair wants to use her as part of an evil plot. Sam, Dean and Ruby search for Anna, but can Ruby be trusted?(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Heaven and Hell. Sam and Dean learn why the angels want to kill Anna. They try to save her by helping her restore a crucial part of her past, even as Alastair and his demons close in on her(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Male in the Mail. Human remains found in mail at a dead-letter office are linked to a local business-service retail centre, where a group of employees are recent lottery winners. Meanwhile, Booth gets surprising news from his grandfather; and Special Agent Genny Shaw learns a lesson in teamwork(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Twist in the Twister. The team discovers the death of a storm chaser may not have been caused by the tornado he was following. Meanwhile, Angela and Hodgins have reservations about letting Angela's father, ZZ Top guitarist Billy F. Gibbons, babysit Michael; and Booth becomes very protective of Brennan at home and at work(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Crack in the Code. A scavenger hunt ensues when a message written in human blood is found at a national monument; Brennan and Booth look for a new home(n)

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The Prisoner in the Pipe. An escaped convict's remains are found in a residential sewer pipe, but the team find evidence that a murder occurred inside a prison. Meanwhile, Booth asks Brennan to take it easy as they await the birth of their baby(n)

programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop is called in when the Chinese consul's daughter is kidnapped. But chaos ensues when he teams up with a flashy LAPD officer assigned to keep him away from the action(n)

programme.title: Claws
programme.desc: Quicksand. Virginia's lies deepen as Desna tries to cover their tracks. Meanwhile, Desna is determined to get her dream salon, and Desna and Bryce are in danger of Uncle Daddy's wrath when something goes awry at the clinic(n)

programme.title: American Race
programme.desc: Entertainment Still So White. The impact of images of race and the media's portrayals of race are explored when Charles Barkley travels to Los Angeles.
